title: Lightweight 22K Gold Kada Bangles with Sparkling CZ Accents
features: Sleek, minimalist design with a high-polish finish. Adorned with evenly spaced, star-shaped CZ settings. The slim profile ensures comfortable wear. These bangles feature a modern take on the traditional Kadiyam style.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranti
or a thoughtful gift for a loved one.
description: Crafted with the finest 22K gold, these bangles offer a perfect blend of tradition and contemporary style. The sparkling CZ accents add a touch of glamour, making them a versatile accessory for any occasion. Lightweight and comfortable, these Kadiyams are perfect for daily wear.
